DOC.brief_title: A Comparative Study Chinese Subjects With Chemotherapy Naïve Stage IV Melanoma Receiving Ipilimumab ( 3 mg/kg ) vs. Dacarbazine
DOC.criteria: For information regard BMS clinical trial participation , please visit www.BMSStudyConnect.com Chinese male female ≥ 18 year age Histologic diagnosis malignant melanoma Chemotherapy naive Stage IV melanoma ( AJCC 2010 ) Life expectancy ≥ 16 week Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group ( ECOG ) performance status 0 1 Evidence brain metastasis brain image Primary ocular mucosal melanoma Any malignancy patient diseasefree less 5 year BRAF status determine Screening test Human Immunodeficiency Virus ( HIV ) positive hepatitis B surface antigen ( HBsAg ) positive , active Hepatitis C infection
